body_html:
@saman-aghazadeh Could you please share the sources from where you could create a graph in c++

I am trying to create a graph in c++ from python code available at https://github.com/wolfib/image-classification-CIFAR10-tf/blob/master/softmax.py but unable to do so as I coudn't find few of the python tensorflow function in C++ , for Eg tf.nn.sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(logits=logits,
labels=labels_placeholder))
